info.title: CoAP Proxy API (for CoAP clients)
info.description:
**This API describes a CoAP-to-HTTP proxy.**

- The endpoints are designed to be accessed by CoAP clients (IoT sensors, devices, etc.), not directly by HTTP clients.
- This documentation is for reference and integration purposes.
- The proxy receives CoAP requests and forwards them to an HTTP backend.

post.summary: Receives temperature data from a sensor
post.description:
Accepts temperature data from a meteostation sensor. The sensorId is provided in the URL path.

Example payload:
```json
{
  "temperature": 22.5
}
```

post.summary: Receives wind speed and direction from a sensor
post.description:
Accepts wind data from a meteostation sensor. The sensorId is provided in the URL path.

Example payload:
```json
{
  "speed": 5.2,
  "direction": 270
}
```
